channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:55 Attention !!! Drive the threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟢 06:55 Attention !!! Drive the threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
